name: Kong!
description:
This is a tribute to the Game & Watch electronic game Donkey Kong Jr.

Only tested on an Android device, a Linux Mint PC and Windows (using Wine).

Made with Godot Engine. GrafX2 for graphics, sfxr for sfx and Vortex Tracker II for the tunes.

Controls:

  • Desktop versions:
    • Cursor keys - move
    • "X" - jump
    • "E" - change / disable CRT effect
    • "F" - change window mode / toggle fullscreen
  • Android:
    • Touchscreen controls

Installation:

Unzip and run the executable. For Android, download and install the APK file.
